titles.title: A bill to settle certain claims arising out of activities on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Inouye with amendments. With written report No. 100-548.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 994.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/2/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay specified sums to: (1) named individuals and entities in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States arising out of certain activities on a South Dakota Indian reservation; and (2) a named legal services agency for services rendered in connection with a congressional reference case.
